content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area (around position 0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Stone furnace at (0,0) processing iron ore into iron plates
- Stone furnace at (2,0) processing iron ore into iron plates
Both furnaces are operational with coal fuel and iron ore input

### Copper Plate Production Area (around position 4,4)
Single stone furnace at (4,4) processing copper ore into copper plates, operational with coal fuel

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (around position 9.5,11.5)
Production line consisting of:
- Input wooden chest at (6.5,11.5)
- Burner inserter at (7.5,11.5) moving items from input chest to assembler
- Assembling machine 1 at (9.5,11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at (11.5,11.5) moving finished products
- Output wooden chest at (12.5,11.5) storing finished electronic circuits

### Power Generation Complex (around position -7,24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5,24.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-7.0,24.5) heating water into steam
- Steam engine at (-2.5,24.5) generating electricity
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam
- Small electric poles distributing power

### Research Facility (around position 0,28.5)
Science setup consisting of:
- Lab for conducting research
- Burner inserter at (0.5,30.5) feeding science packs
- Storage chest at (0.5,31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Errors
- Cannot research already researched technologies (electric-energy-distribution-1, logistics-2, military, steel-processing, advanced-material-processing)
- Missing prerequisites prevent research:
  - Logistics-3 needs production-science-pack
  - Military-science-pack needs military-2
  - Oil-processing needs fluid-handling
  - Fluid-handling needs engine
  - Electric-engine needs lubricant

### Resource Management Errors
- Ensure coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert fuel into boilers
- Monitor fuel levels in machines to prevent them running out

### Entity Connection Errors
- Failed pipe connections between boiler and steam engine - verify correct positioning and connection points

### Invalid Technology References
- Using incorrect technology names (EngineUnit, ElectricEngine) - use correct enum values from Technology class
